text: aldhyn yukhrjwn 'amwalahum mrdat lilah laylana wnharana msrrin wmelnyn, falahum 'ajruhum eind rbhm, wala khawf ealayhim fima ystqblwnh min 'amr alakhrt, wala hum yahzanun ealaa ma fatihim min hzwz aldnya. dhlk altshrye al'ilhy alhakim hu mnhaj al'islam fi al'iinfaq lamaa fih min sdd hajat alfuqara' fi karamat wezt, wtthyr mal alaghnya', watahqiq altaeawun ealaa albiri waltqwa; abtigha' wajh allah dun qhr 'aw 'ikrah
